title: Ticket #6171: use Role: broken for multiple arguments
description:
bash-4.1$ tail -2 condor_config.local
use Role: Submit Execute CentralManager

bash-4.1$ condor_version
$CondorVersion: 8.7.1 Mar 03 2017 BuildID: UW_development PRE-RELEASE-UWCS $
$CondorPlatform: X86_64-RedHat_6.8 $
bash-4.1$ condor_config_val -v DAEMON_LIST
DAEMON_LIST = MASTER SCHEDD
 # at: /scratch/gthain/personal-condor/condor_config.local, line 68
 # raw: DAEMON_LIST = MASTER SCHEDD
remarks:
2017-Mar-06 10:00:08 by johnkn:
works if there are commas separating the roles. This is most likely a regression created when arguments were added to metaknobs.

2017-Apr-17 17:49:10 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Looks good
